casebody.data:
Mary THURBER and Robert Sorce, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
FAIRLEIGH DICKINSON UNIVERSITY; John Davis; Larry Gonello; John Does 1-5 (Fictitious Persons) and ABC Corporations 1-5 (Fictitious Entities), Defendants-Movants. M-1022 September Term 2018
082150 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court for reconsideration in light of Frances Green v. Monmouth University, ___ N.J. ___ (2019). Jurisdiction is not retained.
